title.narrative: GrantCheck - Enhancing NGOs transparency, accountability and integrity in Kenya (Pilot)

description.narrative: Overall Objective: To promote transparency of NGOs in Kenya through increased openness of the granting process whereby donors, grantees and beneficiaries are given full insight into funding flows and where their money goes. This project also aims at giving grantees visibility and helping them meet high standards of transparency by providing useful mapping and reporting for both donors and grantees.;

The initiative aims to enhance transparency, accountability and integrity of Kenyan NGOs through enabling them to easily register and publish all their grants and activities using a free and efficient online tool, GrantCheck. ;
